text: (napiye!) Marana payattal tam vitukalaivittum, ayirakkanakkil veliyeriyavarkalai nir kavanikkavillaiya? Allah avarkalitam"irantu vitunkal" enru kurinan; mintum avarkalai uyirppittan;. Niccayamaka allah manitarkal mitu perum karunaiyutaiyavan; anal manitarkalil perumpalor nanri celuttuvatillai
